Name: Udjat-eye
Description: The udjat-eye depicts an open human eye to which some extra elements have been added. The amulet is connected with the celestial deity in the shape of a falcon and therefore also with the king. It is one of the most popular amulets and was not just used in the funerary cult.This specimen of dark blue faience depicts the right eye in raised relief. It is pierced along the axis of the eye. The upper part has a strong convex curve.
